definitions.text: (comparatives of `far') most remote in space or time or order
examples: had traveled to the farthest frontier
don't go beyond the farthermost (or furthermost) tree
explored the furthest reaches of space
the utmost tip of the peninsula

definitions.text: to the greatest degree or extent or most advanced stage (`furthest' is used more often than `farthest' in this abstract sense)
examples: went the furthest of all the children in her education
she goes farthest in helping us

definitions.text: to the greatest distance in space or time (`farthest' is used more often than `furthest' in this physical sense)
examples: see who could jump the farthest
chose the farthest seat from the door
